type: Tutorial Step - Shall We Improve This?

definition.text: If you experiment with this feature, you will notice that the behavior of each of the settings is not clear or predictable.

paragraphs.text: The current implementation of this feature is not optimal, and the behavior of some of the options is hard to predict. If you are a developer, this may be a great opportunity to iterate on the existing code and take this feature to a more usable state!
Feel free to try this feature, but you will most likely want to go back to the default setting!
